abilities.name: God Save Me from Friends
abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence for a teammate, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a Long-term Project. When you use it to resist you don’t have to be present to use this ability, say how you prepared for this situation in the past.

abilities.name: Foresight
abilities.description: Twice per Run you can assist a teammate without paying Grit. When you run out of Grit, instead of suffering a Stigma you may choose to come back with 1 Grit left. Either way tell us how you prepared for this.

abilities.name: Planning Is Everything
abilities.description: Due to your careful planning, during Downtime, you may give yourself or another Posse member +1 Downtime Action.

abilities.name: Runs in the Family
abilities.description: During Downtime, you get +1 result level when you acquire an asset or reduce Doom. You may choose ’distant cousin’ as an asset arriving by train.

abilities.name: Weaving the Web
abilities.description: ’By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.’ You gain +1d to Consort when you gather information on a target for a run. You get +1d to the engagement roll for that operation. When the engagement roll is 6, gain 1 Grit.

abilities.name: Old Friends Everywhere
abilities.description: When you come to a new town or settlement, name a Friend, Connection, Vice Purveyor, or Enemy you have here. Tell us a story about how you met and about your relationship.

abilities.name: Fingers in Every Pie
abilities.description: At the end of each Downtime phase, you earn +2 Ablass.

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

contacts.name: John P. Little, a cattle baron
